actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the Horizontal Property Act of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Broadens specified definitions of the Horizontal Property Act of the District of Columbia to include "project" (formerly restricted to "structure"). Expands the definition of "condominium project" to include buildings, or other units, which may be either contiguous or detached, in existing or proposed buildings or structures.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Horizontal Property Act of the District of Columbia.
